scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Martin on horseback, dressed in full armor and a red-trimmed hat, cutting a portion of his cloak to give to a beggar. The beggar, kneeling and partially unclothed, extends his hands to receive the fabric. Behind Saint Martin, a contingent of armored soldiers on horseback follows, carrying lances. In the background, a fortified building with towers and arched windows is visible, set against a landscape of trees and a blue sky. The overall scene is framed by an ornate border.
scene_interpretation: The Giving of Alms by Saint Martin
